# ClinicalSim.ai

> AI-powered voice simulation platform for practicing high-stakes medical conversations. Among the first AI communication training platforms backed by a published randomized controlled trial.

## Pages

- [Homepage](https://clinicalsim.ai): Overview of ClinicalSim.ai — AI voice simulation for goals of care, advance care planning, cognitive assessments, and menopause care conversations.
- [About](https://clinicalsim.ai/about): Company background, mission, and the research behind ClinicalSim.ai.
- [Solutions](https://clinicalsim.ai/solutions): Clinical training solutions for billable medical conversations with dedicated Medicare CPT codes.
- [Advance Care Planning](https://clinicalsim.ai/solutions/advance-care-planning): ACP conversation training — CPT 99497/99498, $87 per conversation, no annual cap. Fewer than 5% of eligible patients receive a billed ACP conversation.
- [Goals of Care](https://clinicalsim.ai/solutions/goals-of-care): Serious illness conversation training. Communication failures drive 66% of sentinel events (1995-2005) and 40% of malpractice claims (Candello, 2025).
- [Cognitive Assessments](https://clinicalsim.ai/solutions/cognitive-assessments): Cognitive assessment and dementia diagnosis training — CPT 99483, ~$260 reimbursement. Over 50% of cases go undiagnosed.
- [Menopause Care](https://clinicalsim.ai/solutions/menopause-care): Menopause conversation training. ~54M US women affected, fewer than 1% of providers certified. $40B+ market opportunity.
- [Health System Leaders](https://clinicalsim.ai/audiences/health-system-leaders): ROI-focused communication training for health system executives — revenue capture, malpractice reduction, HCAHPS improvement.
- [Clinicians](https://clinicalsim.ai/audiences/clinicians): On-demand, private, voice-based practice for clinicians — physicians, NPs, and PAs — preparing for difficult conversations.
- [Medical Educators](https://clinicalsim.ai/audiences/medical-educators): ACGME-aligned communication training at scale — evidence-based simulation with milestone tracking.
- [Insights](https://clinicalsim.ai/insights): Research and evidence on medical communication training, simulation technology, and clinical conversation outcomes.
